PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13242022-12-15ESDC,  LAB,  ,  ,  , 
ActGovernment Employees Compensation Act
SubjectOrder Approving the Declaration by the Minister of Labour under Section 2(b) of the Government Employees Compensation Act
PrecisOrder approving the declaration by the Minister of Labour in order to (1) amend the definition of employees for the purpose of the Act to include members and staff of the federal Electoral Boundaries Commissions; and (2) repeal and replace Order in Council P.C. 1982-2674 of September 3, 1982.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Approving the Declaration by the Minister of Labour under Section 2(b) of the Government Employees Compensation Act
precis: Order approving the declaration by the Minister of Labour in order to (1) amend the definition of employees for the purpose of the Act to include members and staff of the federal Electoral Boundaries Commissions; and (2) repeal and replace Order in Council P.C. 1982-2674 of September 3, 1982.
